description: Provides an RDS account resource and used to manage databases.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Description.description: Database description. It cannot begin with https://. It must start with a Chinese character or English letter. It can include Chinese and English characters, underlines (_), hyphens (-), and numbers. The length may be 2-256 characters.

InstanceId.description: The Id of instance in which account belongs.

KmsEncryptedPassword.description: An KMS encrypts password used to a db account. If the `password` is filled in, this field will be ignored.

KmsEncryptionContext.description: An KMS encryption context used to decrypt `kms_encrypted_password` before creating or updating a db account with `kms_encrypted_password`. See [Encryption Context](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/42975.htm). It is valid when `kms_encrypted_password` is set.

Name.description: Operation account requiring a uniqueness check. It may consist of lower case letters, numbers, and underlines, and must start with a letter and have no more than 16 characters.

Password.description: Operation password. It may consist of letters, digits, or underlines, with a length of 6 to 32 characters. You have to specify one of `password` and `kms_encrypted_password` fields.

Type.description:
Privilege type of account.
- Normal: Common privilege.
- Super: High privilege.
